messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Great news!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Oh how wonderful!  Congratulations to you and your family.  It s wonderful that you can raise
messages.messageBody:
<<now my baby will get to live in freedom from day 1,
woo-hoo!>>
Oh how wonderful! Congratulations to you and your family. It's wonderful that you can raise this child with more freedom, compassion, and understanding.
May you have a relaxed pregnancy and a safe and healthy delivery and baby.





Namaste
Maisha
http://khalfanifamilyadventures.blogspot.com
"The period of greatest gain in knowledge and experience is the most difficult period in one's life" ~ The Dalai Lama

messages.subject: Re: Great news!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Congratulations Leslie!  It s interesting to see the differences in children that are unschooled from the beginning. My oldest child has learned a lot through
messages.messageBody:
Congratulations Leslie! It's interesting to see the differences in
children that are unschooled from the beginning. My oldest child has
learned a lot through the journey of seeing his younger sibs
unschooled too.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.messageBody:

Danie

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Great news!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Congrats Leslie!!! My MIL and I were just speaking today about what a wonderful time in life pregnancy and a newborn is.  Please keep us posted. Vicki
messages.messageBody:
Congrats Leslie!!!
My MIL and I were just speaking today about what a wonderful
time in life pregnancy and a newborn is. Please keep us posted.
Vicki

lesliel23 <lesliel23@...> wrote:
I lurk here very frequently and only post occasionally, because most
of my questions get answered through other people's posts. However, I
wanted to share my fantastic news with everyone, b/c everyone here is
so great. After 5 years of trying, I found out I'm pregnant (6
weeks)!!! One of the things I'm most excited about is the opportunity
to unschool from the very beginning! I have a 12 yo dd (will be 13 in
January) and we just started unschooling with her a few months ago and
it has been great, now my baby will get to live in freedom from day 1,
woo-hoo! Just had to share... thanks again to everyone here who keeps
this group going and gives fab answers!

messages.subject: Great news!!!
messages.msgSnippet: I lurk here very frequently and only post occasionally, because most of my questions get answered through other people s posts. However, I wanted to share my
messages.messageBody:
I lurk here very frequently and only post occasionally, because most
of my questions get answered through other people's posts. However, I
wanted to share my fantastic news with everyone, b/c everyone here is
so great. After 5 years of trying, I found out I'm pregnant (6
weeks)!!! One of the things I'm most excited about is the opportunity
to unschool from the very beginning! I have a 12 yo dd (will be 13 in
January) and we just started unschooling with her a few months ago and
it has been great, now my baby will get to live in freedom from day 1,
woo-hoo! Just had to share... thanks again to everyone here who keeps
this group going and gives fab answers!
